plot: After a successful hit, two cowboys find themselves in possession of The White Shoes. Whoever wears the shoes rules the city. Cutting in front of the cities biggest gangster, the two learn that whoever wears the shoes wears a target.
title: The White Shoes
plot_es: After a successful hit, two cowboys find themselves in possession of The White Shoes. Whoever wears the shoes rules the city. Cutting in front of the cities biggest gangster, the two learn that whoever wears the shoes wears a target.
plot_en: After a successful hit, two cowboys find themselves in possession of The White Shoes. Whoever wears the shoes rules the city. Cutting in front of the cities biggest gangster, the two learn that whoever wears the shoes wears a target.
